attributes.action: substanional pay increase for hgv drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why is it that you can go to a local super market and the self packer is on £7.20 an hour and a hgv driver with all that responability i.e £100.000 tractor unit with trailer can end up with a load worth 1/4 to 1/2 a million pounds worth of goods is only on min wages
lets see the drivers of british industry get better wages of pay.
